unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore – Diwali Bumper for Homebuyers!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore – Diwali Bumper for Homebuyers!**

unnormalised: Hey there, future homeowners! Diwali’s early this year with a shower of amazing home loan schemes! Banks like HDFC and SBI are tripping over themselves to offer the lowest interest rates in, like, forever. We're talking rates starting at a jaw-dropping 7.99%!
normalised: Hey there, future homeowners! Diwali’s early this year with a shower of amazing home loan schemes! Banks like H D F C and S B I are tripping over themselves to offer the lowest interest rates in, like, forever. We're talking rates starting at a jaw-dropping seven point ninety nine percent!

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that cozy 2BHK in Powai or maybe a sprawling villa near Bangalore? Now's the time! Dr. Reddy even mentioned a never-before-seen processing fee waiver at the recent press conference.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that cozy two B H K in Powai or maybe a sprawling villa near Bangalore? Now's the time! Doctor Reddy even mentioned a never-before-seen processing fee waiver at the recent press conference.

unnormalised: Plus, many builders in Gurgaon are teaming up with banks for pre-approved loans, making the process smoother than butter chicken.
normalised: Plus, many builders in Gurgaon are teaming up with banks for pre-approved loans, making the process smoother than butter chicken.

unnormalised: Imagine, owning that 1200 sq ft dream home you’ve always wanted.
normalised: Imagine, owning that one thousand two hundred square feet dream home you’ve always wanted.

unnormalised: Some schemes even offer extended repayment periods, stretching up to 30 years! Talk to your bank and compare options before jumping in.
normalised: Some schemes even offer extended repayment periods, stretching up to thirty years! Talk to your bank and compare options before jumping in.

unnormalised: Remember to check the fine print, though! Look out for hidden charges and prepayment penalties. Don't just blindly chase the lowest EMI.
normalised: Remember to check the fine print, though! Look out for hidden charges and prepayment penalties. Don't just blindly chase the lowest E M I.

unnormalised: Happy house hunting, and Shubh Diwali in advance!
normalised: Happy house hunting, and Shubh Diwali in advance!
